guestthoughts.TourAnimalsBad1: I didn't see enough happy animals on this tour.
guestthoughts.TourAnimalsBad2: I was expecting to see more animals on this tour.
guestthoughts.TourAnimalsBad3: Why make a zoo tour without lots of animals?
guestthoughts.TourAnimalsBad4: I wish there were more animals to see on this tour.
guestthoughts.TourEventOK8: I like %s, but I hope there's more stuff on this tour.
